name.zh: 雪人山地生活视频博客
name.ja: イエティ山岳生活ブログ
name.es: Vlog de Vida en la Montaña del Yeti
name.fr: Vlog de Vie en Montagne du Yéti

description.en: Documentary-style vlog following a friendly yeti's daily life in the snowy mountains
description.zh: 纪录片风格的视频博客，跟随友善雪人在雪山中的日常生活
description.ja: 雪山での友好的なイエティの日常生活を追うドキュメンタリー風のブログ
description.ko: 눈 덮인 산에서 친근한 예티의 일상 생활을 따라가는 다큐멘터리 스타일 브이로그
description.es: Vlog estilo documental siguiendo la vida diaria de un yeti amigable en las montañas nevadas
description.de: Dokumentarfilm-artiger Vlog über das tägliche Leben eines freundlichen Yetis in den verschneiten Bergen
description.fr: Vlog de style documentaire suivant la vie quotidienne d'un yéti amical dans les montagnes enneigées
description.ar: مدونة فيديو بأسلوب وثائقي تتبع الحياة اليومية لييتي ودود في الجبال المثلجة

promptTemplate: POV selfie of a realistic white-furred Yeti in {weather_condition} conditions during {time_of_day}, holding a selfie stick with the camera at the end, standing majestically in the Himalayan mountains. {activity_description} The scene unfolds in the breathtaking Himalayan landscape with towering snow-capped peaks reaching into the clouds, pristine glaciers gleaming under natural light, and ancient ice formations creating a dramatic backdrop. Prayer flags flutter in the mountain winds while the thin, crisp air sparkles with ice crystals. Far below, deep valleys disappear into misty clouds, emphasizing the incredible altitude and isolation of this sacred mountain realm. The atmosphere is both serene and powerful, filled with the sounds of mountain winds and distant avalanches echoing through the peaks. National Geographic documentary style, HD quality with cinematic depth of field capturing the majesty of high-altitude wilderness. The Yeti turns to face the camera directly and speaks to the audience in his deep, wise mountain voice: '{voiceover_content}' No background narration or voiceover - only the Yeti's direct speech is heard.

options.activity_description: He scoops up fresh, powdery snow and gently scrubs his thick white fur, demonstrating his daily grooming routine with surprising gentleness for such a massive creature.
options.voiceover_content: Fresh powder cleans the fur. Mountain hygiene 101.

options.activity_description: He kneels down and examines animal tracks in the snow with expert precision, his keen eyes reading the story of mountain wildlife movements.
options.voiceover_content: Snow leopard tracks... They're getting bolder.

options.activity_description: He carefully gathers rare Himalayan herbs and combines them with pristine glacier water, creating a steaming mountain tea in a natural ice bowl.
options.voiceover_content: Glacier water tea. Better than coffee shops below.

options.activity_description: He effortlessly scales a nearly vertical ice wall with his massive claws, demonstrating incredible strength and agility that would be impossible for humans.
options.voiceover_content: Humans need gear. I just need these.

options.activity_description: He punches through thick glacier ice with his bare fists and reaches into the icy water to catch fish with lightning-fast reflexes.
options.voiceover_content: Ice fishing, Yeti style. No equipment needed.

options.activity_description: He suddenly stops and tilts his head, listening intently to subtle mountain sounds. His expression turns serious as he detects dangerous snow conditions.
options.voiceover_content: Hear that rumble? Time to move. Been doing this for centuries.

options.activity_description: He points excitedly at rare daytime aurora phenomena visible only from extreme altitude, his eyes reflecting the ethereal lights dancing across the sky.
options.voiceover_content: Humans only see aurora at night. We know the daytime spots.

options.activity_description: He arranges beautiful ice sculptures and crystal formations in his snow cave home, creating surprisingly artistic and comfortable living spaces.
options.voiceover_content: Home improvement, Yeti edition. Ice furniture lasts forever.

options.activity_description: He demonstrates how to use natural glacier caves as refrigeration, organizing and storing mountain game with ancient preservation techniques.
options.voiceover_content: Natural freezer everywhere. Food stays fresh for decades.

options.activity_description: He moves silently through the darkness with supernatural stealth, his glowing eyes scanning for mountain wildlife with perfect night vision.
options.voiceover_content: Night vision is standard for Yetis. Humans miss half the fun.

options.activity_description: He calmly reinforces his shelter as a massive blizzard rages outside, showing no fear of the extreme weather conditions that would terrify most creatures.
options.voiceover_content: Category 5 blizzard? Just Tuesday night up here.

options.activity_description: He lies back against an ice formation and gazes up at the infinite starry sky, his ancient wisdom evident in his contemplative expression.
options.voiceover_content: At 20,000 feet, everything looks small. Perspective changes.

options.activity_description: He arranges thick layers of mountain moss and fur in his ice cave, creating a surprisingly cozy sleeping area despite the extreme cold.
options.voiceover_content: Mountain sleep secret? Embrace the cold, don't fight it.

options.activity_description: He sits in perfect stillness on a mountain peak, his breathing synchronized with the mountain winds as he enters deep meditative states.
options.voiceover_content: Meditating for millennia. Mountains talk if you listen.

options.activity_description: He performs a custom mountain activity. [Add your specific Yeti activity details here]
options.voiceover_content: [Add your custom Yeti mountain commentary here]

activity_description.label: Activity Description
activity_description.default: He scoops up fresh, powdery snow and gently scrubs his thick white fur, demonstrating his daily grooming routine with surprising gentleness for such a massive creature.
activity_description.placeholder: Describe the specific mountain activity and actions...
activity_description.description: Detailed description of what the Yeti is doing in this scene

voiceover_content.label: Voiceover Content
voiceover_content.default: Fresh powder cleans the fur. Mountain hygiene 101.
voiceover_content.description: What the Yeti says during this mountain activity
